en.alias: Meaning-making in a crisis: Finding meaning 5 (Summary)

sections.title: # Well ~~done!~~
sections.content:
Well done for completing Finding meaning. You’ve just done a wonderful thing for yourself.

If you’re participating in a group sharing, please keep your notes handy.

You’re being invited to share about a time in your life when you felt a sense of meaning and purpose.

Consider the following questions
* What was going on in your life at that time?
* How did you feel as a result of having more meaning and purpose?

sv.alias: Meaning-making in a crisis: Finding meaning 5 (Summary)

sections.title: # Bra ~~jobbat!~~
sections.content:
Bra jobbat. Du har precis gjort en fin sak för dig själv.

Om du deltar i en grupp, ha dina anteckningar från övningen där du upplevde mening och syfte nära till hands.

Förbered dig genom att svara på följande frågor

* Vad hände i ditt liv vid den tiden?
* Hur mådde du när du kände mer mening och syfte?

pt.alias: Meaning-making in a crisis: Finding meaning 5 (Summary)

sections.title: # ~~Parabéns!~~
sections.content:
Parabéns por completares **Encontrar significado**. Acabaste de fazer uma coisa maravilhosa pelo teu bem-estar.

Se estiveres a participar num grupo de partilha, mantém as tuas notas à mão.

Vais ser convidada/o a partilhar uma fase da tua vida em que tiveste uma sensação de significado e propósito.

Considera as seguintes perguntas

* O que se estava a passar na tua vida nessa altura?
* O que sentiste por encontrares mais significado e propósito?
